short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's a extension that can speak out word/sentence/article in English.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It's a useful tool when your are learning Language. It can speak out the word/sentence/article you highlight so that you can listene the pronunciation of a language.

After you install the extension, just do the following things: 
1. Refreshing the pages you have opened. (It just need do once.)
2. Highlighting a article content.
3. Right click on mouse.
4. Clicking "Spead up ðŸ“£ ðŸ“£".
